articles.title: Europe's biggest tech conference to be held in-person in November - Reuters
articles.description: Europe's biggest tech conference - the Web Summit - will return as an in-person event in Lisbon this November, organisers confirmed to Reuters on Wednesday, after the event was held online last year due to the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content: LISBON, Aug 11 (Reuters) - Europe's biggest tech conference - the Web Summit - will return as an in-person event in Lisbon this November, organisers confirmed to Reuters on Wednesday, after the event… [+1885 chars]
